column4: The node in the educational framework is designed to address alternative pathways for learners with impaired vision.
The node in the educational framework is designed to address alternative pathways for learners with impaired hearing.
The node in the educational framework is designed to address alternative pathways for learners with impaired communication.
The node in the educational framework is designed to address alternative pathways for learners with impaired mobility.
The node in the educational framework is designed for a general audience.
